title: Rang De Basanti
writer: Renzil D'Silva, Prasoon Joshi, Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra
short_cast: Aamir Khan, Siddharth, Atul Kulkarni, Sharman Joshi, Kunal Kapoor, Alice Patten, Soha Ali Khan, Waheeda Rehman, Kiron Kher, Om Puri, Anupam Kher, Madhavan
cast: Aamir Khan, Siddharth, Atul Kulkarni, Sharman Joshi, Kunal Kapoor, Alice Patten, Soha Ali Khan, Waheeda Rehman, Kiron Kher, Om Puri, Anupam Kher, Madhavan
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: An idealistic English filmmaker casts a group of student actors in her docudrama about India's revolution against British rule in the 1920s.
